name: Peanut Butter Milk Stout on Nitro
description: Formerly known as Nutty Professor Peanut Butter Milk Stout, this creamy, full-bodied milk stout is infused with the essence of peanut butter and chocolate and balanced by a hint of sweetness. No tricks, only treats! Made extra creamy and vibrant by serving it on one of our nitro taps!
